jd: From: Pradeep, Scalable Systems pradeep.sharma@scalable-systems.com Reply to: pradeep.sharma@scalable-systems.com Hi,Greetings of the day! Job Title: Data Engineer Location: Wolfe City, TX (Work from Office)Duration: Long Term Contract Responsibilities:DocumentationReverse engineer the code/process and document it in a specific format (Data Dictionary/Source to Target Mapping document).Individual will perform a broad range of data processing and analysis to support the project activities.Individual should be able to:o Decipher the python codes and SQL to understand how the data is tied together.o Carry out the data analysis; communicate the results verbally and in a deck to a technical and non-technical audience.o Work with large set of data? Have experience using SQL and Python for data reporting purposes.The consultant also needs to have experience SQL querying and python/Pyspark skills.Strong PL/SQL, Hadoop, Python/Pyspark experience.Experience with troubleshooting code.Will be responsible for the analysis, design, debugging and documentation of applications to satisfy the requirements of one or more user areas.
